concept.title: Grace Period
concept.abstract:
The Grace Period functionality allows staff users to define a period of time called a Grace Period on the subscription plan that will allow for two pieces of functionality:
The subscriber will receive benefits of the subscription through the end of the grace period. This means that badges assigned to the subscriber will have an Expired Date defined by the Grace Period End Date on the Subscription record.
If a subscriber allows their subscription to lapse but remains within the grace period upon renewal, the start date of the new term will start the day after the subscriptionâ€™s paid through date just as if they had renewed on without letting their membership expire. Example: Paid Through Date = 12/31/2016, Grace Period End Date = 2/28/2017, Renewal Date = 1/15/2017, New Term Start Date: 1/1/2017

ol.li: Navigate to the Subscription Plan record.

Enter the number of days you wish to give as a grace period in the Grace Period field.
You can now navigate to any subscription and see the Grace Period End Date populated to be the Paid Through Date plus the Grace Period.
